name: GKInviteEventListener
desc: A protocol that handles invite events from Game Center.

items.name: func player(GKPlayer, didAccept: GKInvite)
items.desc: Handles the event when the local player accepts an invitation from another player.

items.name: func player(GKPlayer, didRequestMatchWithRecipients: [GKPlayer])
items.desc: Handles the event when a player sends other players an invitation to join a match.
